featured.text: The fashion soon spread beyond the circle of the nobility to the middle classes, and tea became a popular drink at the London coffee houses where people met to do business and discuss events of the day.
Which of the following aspects about hard hats is NOT discussed in the passage? (A) Their functions.
Scientists have been discussing crown shyness since the 1920s, proposing 12 explanations for the phenomenon.
Exchange sites recommend that swappers discuss such matters ahead of time.

other.text: Before a match is made, potential swappers tend to discuss a lot.
To discuss how cavities can be treated.
Robot Redford’s speech was discussed in this article mainly because .
Clunes, in Australia, holds a monthly book talk that hosts authors to discuss their latest 14 .
To discuss the content of alcoholic drinks in ancient Europe.
To discuss how a modern epidemic may spread quickly.
Who gave the name “the Swiss army knife” to the knife discussed in the passage? (A) Carl Elsener.
Which of the following is NOT discussed in the passage? (A) Facial expressions. (B) Physical contact.
Which of the following is true about the deer issue discussed in the passage? (A) RTRI’s new invention prompts deer to run away.
Why is the footwear discussed in the passage called “flip-flop”?

definition.en_def: To talk about something with another person or a group in order to reach a decision or to exchange ideas.
definition.example: We need to discuss our plans for the weekend.
